issue.title: Do not link against libpython
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-223](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-223). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Only binaries embedding Python itself should link against libpython, on some systems (e.g. Debian based ones) there is not even a libpython by default.
